channel.title: Change look by clicking object or npc
channel.description:
Ok so im running testscape. my ::char command ust to work...but only once per player... i would like to kno how to change your look from eather
1. clicking on a set object and loading the char interface
or
2. clicking on an npc and it loads the char interface
Tnx -Lost Island Team-[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 23:36:47[/size][hr]Plz sum 1 help it would be a nice thing to have on my server :(

item.title: Change look by clicking object or npc
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

cool. cant i just put in the id for the object or dose it have to be co-ords?
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 13:01:56[/size][hr]OMG u OWN it worked xD >.<

Read full topic
item.source: Change look by clicking object or npc

item.title: Change look by clicking object or npc
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

just search for like this

if (objectID == 10284) // Barrows Chest
		{
		barrowsChest();
		}

then add this above it.

if (objectX == #### && objectY == $$$$){
showInterface(%%%%);
}

Replace the #### with x cord of object, the $$$$ with y coord of object and the %%%% with the interface, 3559 is the char interface.

Read full topic
item.source: Change look by clicking object or npc
